title: Romantic Malaga Oasis on Costa Del Sol with Five Onsite Restaurants
description: Experience five-star romance where the mountains meet the Mediterranean Sea with an escape to the Finca Cortesin, a true oasis on Spain's dazzling Costa del Sol. Inspired by traditional Andalusian architecture, the resort combines luxury with contemporary living: enjoy a round of golf on the championship course, wander down to the exclusive Finca Cortesin Beach Club, or pamper yourself at The Spa and yoga centre. After days of beach-hopping, spend your evenings at one of the five magnificent onsite restaurants.
offer_address: Carretera de Casares KM 2, 29690 Casares, Malaga, Spain
